data.title: Metropolitan Opera
data.text:
There’s no better way to experience grand opera at the Met than as a Subscriber. Curate your perfect subscription package of six or more operas and enjoy savings of up to 15% compared with the price of single tickets as well as exclusive Subscriber benefits.

Members enjoy exclusive benefits, including Opera magazine, ticketing priority, and special discounts throughout the year. If you’re already a member, consider increasing your support to the next level.

Getting Met tickets has never been easier! With the new Met Opera app, you can easily purchase tickets on your phone and store them in your digital wallet. You can also enter the rush-ticket lottery, which offers great seats at just $25. And, as a special offer, save 20% on your first in-app single-ticket order. Download today!

Tickets are on sale now in the U.S. and Canada for the 2024–25 Live in HD season. International ticketing dates may vary.
